posts.post_title: WTB: T206 Evers w/Bat, Chicago on Shirt PSA 1.5-3
posts.post_content:
Looking to pick up a Johnny Evers w/Bat, Chicago on Shirt, PSA graded in the 1.5-3 range. Common backs preferred. Please PM me if you have one you’d be willing to sell.

Mike
I have a PSA 2 but am in Canada
